parameter.name: toItem
parameter.label: To Item Chain
parameter.description: Chain of transformations (separated by "∩") used for converting values from the channel to the linked item.

parameter.name: toChannel
parameter.label: To Channel Chain
parameter.description: Chain of transformations (separated by "∩") used for converting values from the channel to the linked item.

parameter.name: undefOnError
parameter.label: UNDEF On Error
parameter.description: If "true", UNDEF is used if the transformation failed, otherwise the input is ignored (default).
